001package src.controller;
002
003import javafx.fxml.FXML;
004import javafx.scene.control.TableView;
005import javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent;
006import javafx.scene.control.DatePicker;
007import javafx.scene.control.TableColumn;
008
009import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
010
011import javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty;
012import javafx.collections.FXCollections;
013import javafx.collections.ObservableList;
014import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
015import src.database.dbConnect;
016import java.sql.*;
017import java.time.LocalDate;
018
019public class inventory_page_controller {
020
021    @FXML
022    private TableView<ObservableList<String>> tableData;
023    @FXML
024    private TableColumn<ObservableList<String>, String> ingredientCol;
025    @FXML
026    private TableColumn<ObservableList<String>, String> quantityCol;
027
028    @FXML
029    private DatePicker startDate;
030    @FXML
031    private DatePicker endDate;
032
033    /**
034     * This function handles the back click action
035     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
036     */
037    @FXML
038    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
039        switch_scene("GUI/manager_view.fxml", event);
040    }
041    
042    /**
043     * This function handles the menu items button click
044     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
045     */
046    @FXML
047    private void handle_menu_click(MouseEvent event) {
048        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * This function handles the inventory button click
053     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
054     */
055    @FXML
056    private void handle_inventory_click(MouseEvent event) {
057        switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * This function handles the sales button click
062     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
063     */
064    @FXML
065    private void handle_sales_click(MouseEvent event) {
066        switch_scene("GUI/sales_page.fxml", event);
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * This function handles the view items button click
071     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
072    */
073    @FXML
074    private void handle_view_inventory_click(ActionEvent event) {
075        switch_scene("GUI/view_inventory.fxml", event);
076    }
077    
078    /**
079     * This function constanlty listens to data text entries and calls its handler to load the ingredient usage table
080     */
081    public void initialize() {
082        startDate.valueProperty().addListener((obs, oldVal, newVal) -> checkAndLoadData());
083        endDate.valueProperty().addListener((obs, oldVal, newVal) -> checkAndLoadData());
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * This function checks if the from and to dates have been entered and fills product usage table if they are filled
088     */
089    private void checkAndLoadData() {
090        LocalDate start = startDate.getValue();
091        LocalDate end = endDate.getValue();
092        if (start != null && end != null) {
093            loadIngredientUsage(start, end);
094        }
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * This functions loads the product usage information by ingredient name given a user-inputted data range
099     * @param startDate - start date of the usage data
100     * @param endDate - end date of the usage data
101     */
102    private void loadIngredientUsage(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) {
103        ObservableList<ObservableList<String>> data = FXCollections.observableArrayList();
104        String query = """
105            SELECT i.ingredientname, ROUND(SUM(di.quantity)::numeric, 0) AS totalUsed
106            FROM orders o
107            JOIN orderitems oi ON o.orderid = oi.orderid
108            JOIN drinkingredients di ON oi.productid = di.productid
109            JOIN ingredients i ON di.ingredientid = i.ingredientid
110            WHERE o.orderdate BETWEEN ? AND ?
111            GROUP BY i.ingredientname
112            ORDER BY i.ingredientname;
113        """;
114        
115        try (Connection conn = dbConnect.getConnection()) {
116            PreparedStatement checkStmt = conn.prepareStatement(query);
117            checkStmt.setDate(1, java.sql.Date.valueOf(startDate));
118            checkStmt.setDate(2, java.sql.Date.valueOf(endDate));
119            ResultSet rs = checkStmt.executeQuery();
120
121            while (rs.next()) {
122                ObservableList<String> row = FXCollections.observableArrayList();
123                row.add(rs.getString("ingredientname"));
124                row.add(String.valueOf(rs.getDouble("totalUsed")));
125                data.add(row);
126            }
127
128            ingredientCol.setCellValueFactory(datainput -> new SimpleStringProperty(datainput.getValue().get(0)));
129            quantityCol.setCellValueFactory(datainput -> new SimpleStringProperty(datainput.getValue().get(1)));
130
131            tableData.setItems(data);
132        } catch (SQLException e) {
133            return;
134        }
135    }
136}
